issue.subject: Diffusion page small enhancements
issue.description:
We'd like to make some enhancements on the diffusion page to ease it's usage by users:

* Make extraction mining default to manual (1: it's the most used, 2: providers with auto mining are power users)
* Download : translate the storage types (local, url, zoning)
* Add tooltips on labels
* Use Yes-No boostrap radios instead of checkboxes to enable download and extraction
* When pricing is not free, disable the _download_ form instead of hiding it
* Use a different string for the extraction role (currently the same as in the resource view)
* Move Min and Max surface under perimeter (it makes more sense to have them here...)
* Add some IDs to allow CSS customization
* -if available, select the free perimeter by default (new diffusion)-

custom_fields.name: Ergonomic impact
custom_fields.value: ease the page comprehension and usage by users
